author: fwyzard
body:
Add rocSHMEM development library.

For the changes since ROCm 6.3.2, see:
  - [ROCm 6.3.3 release notes](https://rocm.docs.amd.com/en/docs-6.3.3/about/release-notes.html)
  - [ROCm 6.4.0 release notes](https://rocm.docs.amd.com/en/docs-6.4.0/about/release-notes.html)
  - [ROCm 6.4.1 release notes](https://rocm.docs.amd.com/en/docs-6.4.1/about/release-notes.html)
  - [ROCm 6.4.2 release notes](https://rocm.docs.amd.com/en/docs-6.4.2/about/release-notes.html)
  - [ROCm 6.4.3 release notes](https://rocm.docs.amd.com/en/docs-6.4.3/about/release-notes.html)
title: Update ROCm to version 6.4.3
